name: rageswitch
description:
Rageswitch is a small action 2D platformer, where you use gravity pads to change gravity and go over 10 unique levels as fast as you can. It was made in one week, but I actually worked on it for only about 10 hours. I hope you'll like it!

Controls:
A and D - move
W or space - jump
R - restart level
M - menu / restart whole game
